title: How I Helped My Baby Sleep Through the Night by 3 Months
content:
As a first-time mom, I struggled with sleepless nights until I discovered a gentle bedtime routine that really worked. I started by establishing a consistent schedule: bath, book, and lullaby at the same time every night. I also used a white noise machine and dim lighting to signal it's time for sleep.

The biggest game changer? A swaddle and a simple technique called the "pause" â€” instead of rushing in at the first stir, I waited a few moments to see if my baby could settle himself. By week two, he was sleeping 6â€“7 hours straight!

Every baby is different, but I hope this gives other parents some hope and ideas
